com.mygdx.game.Controller.Entities

Class EntityBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Controller.Entities.EntityBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlienAttackBody, AlienBody, ConsumableBody, HeroBody, PlatfBlocksBody, PlatfFastBody, PlatformsBody, PlatfSlowBody, PlatfSpikesBody, PortalBody, RareItemBody

    public class EntityBody
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents an abstract physical body supported by a Box2D body.

    • Method Detail

      • createFixture

        final void createFixture(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body body,
                         float[] vertexes,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         float density,
                         float friction,
                         float restitution,
                         short category,
                         short mask)
        Method to create a polygon fixture represented by a set of vertexes.
        Parameters:
        body - The body the fixture is to be attached to.
        vertexes - The vertexes defining the fixture in pixels
        width - The width of the bitmap the vertexes where extracted from.
        height - The height of the bitmap the vertexes where extracted from.
        density - The density of the fixture. How heavy it is in relation to its area.
        friction - The friction of the fixture. How slippery it is.
        restitution - The restitution of the fixture. How much it bounces.
        category -
        mask -
